author: joakime
msg: [MRM-582] Remote Repositories with empty <username> and <password> fields shouldn't be created in configuration.
Implemented on-load cleanup of remote repo username/password (instead of on-save)
Implemented proper check for blank username/password in proxy connectors.

author: mbaessler
msg: update RegularExpressionAnnotator POM to work with the PEARPackagingMavenPlugin changes

author: mbaessler
msg: change the way how the compiled classes of the Maven component build are added to the PEAR package.
Now the jar is used and added to the PEAR package and not the classes from the target folder.
